path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - SingSing Smartcontracts - v1.0.pdf

findings.title: PassBreeding.sol - Missing contract call blocking
findings.description: The finding does not provide a detailed description.

findings.title: User can control randomness result in reveal function
findings.description: The reveal function generates a random number used for creating a superpass, but users can delay calling the giveBirth function to control the random result since the blockHash is a zero-filled bytes32 string.

findings.title: Vesting contract may not have enough tokens
findings.description: The Vesting contract may not have sufficient tokens.

findings.title: Breeding fees must be updated when maxBreedTimes is updated
findings.description: In the PassBase contract, the default value for maxBreedTimes is 3, but when updating the maxBreedTimes variable, the breeding fees are not updated accordingly.

findings.title: PassNFT.sol - transfer function can only be used by token owner
findings.description: The transfer function allows approved user calling it. However, if the calling user is not the owner of input token, they still cannot transfer it using the transfer function.

findings.title: PassBreeding.sol - Autobirth daemon cannot call giveBirth without _revealHash
findings.description: The autobirth daemon may not have the corresponding _revealHash of the input _dataHash so it cannot call the giveBirth function.

findings.title: classTokenCount may exceed classTokenLimit
findings.description: In the _selectClass function, when the selectedClass is Bronze , the classTokenCount may exceed the classTokenLimit.

findings.title: PassNFT.sol - Missing IERC721Enumerable and IERC721Metadata interface
findings.description: The supportsInterface function of the PassNFT contract does not include IERC721Enumerable and IERC721Metadata interfaces.

findings.title: Pausable Logic Must Be Implemented in _beforeTokenTransfer Hook
findings.description: The SingSingToken contract extends the Pausable contract which may be used to pause token transfers. However, the implementation is not correct.
